alert.note: Alert for Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sullivan, northeastern Washington, central Johnson, central Carter and southwestern Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 815 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elizabethton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Elizabethton, Abingdon, Mountain City, Central, Pine Crest and Walnut Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
